entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia early this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low zero.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023
